entry.title: Monday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries ending this evening then clearing. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm except snowfall amount 2 cm in a few localities. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 7:45 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 11. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:45 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 7:45 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
